title: Dishwasher and Disposal, Granite Countertops*
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 899 Sq.
We’re an apartment community built for an Englewood lifestyle of social afternoons, daily exercise, and relaxing in your luxurious home.

Virtually tour our one- and two-bedroom floor plans with their high ceilings and private patios / balconies - move about the spacious interiors, and welcome in the outside air every day you’re with us.
Our residents have access to the amenities they need to meet the lifestyle they deserve.
Our community features a fitness center with weights and cardiovascular training equipment, an on-site technology hub, our off-leash dog park, and a sparkling pool.
Our community is located in the heart of the Denver Tech Center with Marina Square and Belleview Promenade at your doorstep.
Prewired with Fiber Optic and Cable, Extra Storage, Walk-in Closets, Private Patio or Balconies, Washer and Dryer, Open Gourmet Kitchens with Island*,
9- And 10-foot Ceilings*, Custom Wood Cabinets, Wide Plank Flooring*, Air Conditioner, Intrusion Alarms Available for Monitoring*, Stainless-steel Appliances*, Ceiling Fans
Throughout, Granite Countertops*, Generously Sized Tubs and Shower with Tile Surrounds, Tile Backsplashes*, Dishwasher and Disposal

Off-leash Dog Park, Elevator, Onsite Management, 24/7 Package Concierge System, Kitchens, Fitness Center with Cardio and Weight Equipment, Clubroom with Shuffleboard, Foosball, Pool Table and Large Screen TVs, Technology Hub with Fully Connected Computer, Guest Room, Inviting Pool with Landscaped Sundecks, Resident Lounge with Catering Kitchen and Bar, Night Patrol, Controlled Access/Gated, Conference Room For Meetings and Calls, Business Center, Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace and Gas Grills
